description: When he hears a knock at the door, the last thing Markie More expected to see was step-brother David Rose, but the fact that David has come back into town is just the beginning of the surprises in store for Markie. David confesses to secretly having a crush on Markie when they were growing up, and Markie lets David know he thought about it all the time as well. With all their brotherly secrets out in the open, the two of them can finally bond in a way they have both been craving for so long, and they act on their familial lust before their better judgment talks them out of it. It's a family reunion years in the making when these two brothers finally cum together.
title: Brotherly Visit
